tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom was suffering with arthritis for last 15 years and she was reluctant to get her knees replaced. Her non-medical expert friends (largely housewives)  kept on brainwashing her about the failure ration of knee replacement surgery. You will be surprised to know that non of her expert advisers had ever encountered knee issues / surgery and still they continued to preach about the threats, risk and failure ratio of such surgery. 

My mother's knee issue went on aggravating and had reached a stage were she almost stopped walking, the gap between two knees increased from few centimeters to almost a feet, her knee pain started taking toll on her hip, ankles and spine. Pain killer pills had its own issues. In all her situation was deteriorating at a very fast pace. 

The situation was worsening day by day till the time we met Dr.  Girish Bhalerao from Wokhardt Hospital Miraroad. His mesmerizing positive attitude and confidence impressed all of us including my mom and she finally got convinced for the surgery.

 Dr.  Bhalerao ensured that he explained each and every aspect about the line of treatment and gave us sufficient time for clarifying our doubts. Have met so many doctors in the past and this was the first time that some body actually cared about our silly queries and concerns. Must admit that the doctor was a thorough professional and was brilliant in his  specialized skills. He recommended a cost effective treatment and also ensured that unnecessary overhead costs are eliminated. While checking reviews about the doctor i learned that he is associated with various international institutes and has largely worked in international space on knee and spine related ailments. 

Few reason why one should consult with Dr.  Girish Bhalerao:

1. Years of experience in knee and hip replacement both in India and Abroad.
2. Follows international standards and protocols while treating patients 
3. Invests time in explaining each and every specification with the patient and relatives. 
4. Has positive reputation in market 
5. Honest and Genuine doctor 
6. Commits and delivers with 0% deviation
7. Down to earth and humble person 

In all we are very happy with the doctor, line of treatment and the hospital. Today after 1 month of surgery my mom is able to walk without any support, she can bend both her knees to almost 70 degrees against 140 degrees (earlier).  She walks almost 1kms per day and manages to exercise without any external intervention. Gap between both the knees has reduced to few centimeters against a feet. The complex surgery looked simple to us only because we had one of the best doctor standing by our side. 

My sincere thanks to Dr.  Girish Bhalerao for being such an outstanding professional, who helped us in steer through the medical situation smoothly.

tags: None
review:
Excellent operation performed by Dr. Girish Bhalerao who is a knee specialist. He is an expert/ specialist of injury that happens due to sports.
I had a knee injury and couldn’t bent my left leg, I consulted few orthopedic doctors but could not get better or got convinced of getting operated until I met Dr. Girish Bhalerao.
After the consultation the dr. explained me every detail of what had happened to my leg and what surgery would I require to get back to my original strength. He is so confident with his work that I wanted to get operated immediately.
I was so confident in the doctor because he uses every possible means to take out the fear of a patient and directs you to the truth and gives you correct informations. He uses 3D structures, 3D videos and videos of actual operation to explain everything. And behaves very calmly and joyful in situations.
On the day of operation I was guided and explained everything nicely. It was the best hospital visits ever in my life because it didn’t had anything to fear.
Along with it the staff was so cooperative and generous. They helped and did their duties wholeheartedly and by staying grounded.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Girish Bhalerao is very friendly and approachable, he is one of the best here with international experience , He explained everything practically what needs to be done and he did advice me the best of treatment Pre and post surgery. 

Dr Girish and his team at Wockhardt hospital performed the ACL reconstruction procedure With the best equipments .And within a week I am already having good knee stability and movement which is a great progress... Dr Girish has also planned my post operative rehabilitation for the coming months very well.. With monitored physiotherapy and exercises best of his knowledge.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Girish Bhalerao is a talented, friendly, and patient doctor. My mom and dad both consulted him at Worchard Hospital. He is knowledgeable and creates a safe environment for each patient. I highly recommend anyone to visit Dr. Girish anytime for safe and affordable treatment.

tags: None
review:
Hello everyone This is Mohsin Laddawala i stay at Mira Road, i am sharing my story today i was suffering with my lower back issue (L5, S1). I was not able sleep, walk neither stand properly i have consulted few doctors. But my pain was terrible and i was really down. Than i check online which is nearby Hospital where i can consult. I have seen couple of doctors and read the reviews than i thought let show to Dr. Girish Bhalerao.
I have went on 28th March 2020 and shown to Doctor he explain me very well & clear all my doubts and told that i need to go under surgery. I was little worried but he assure me & gave full confidence. After the surgery he made me “Brand New Man”. So he is very positive person and even hospital staff was very co-operative. So yes my experience was great. Thanks

tags: None
review:
Dr. Girish Bhalerao  is a great doctor! He’s very understanding and listens to your concerns. Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also, He is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. 

He takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues! I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a specialist. 
Dr. Girish Bhalerao
 Orthopedic Super Specialty Surgeon and Consultant at Wockhardt Hospitals Ltd

Thanks & Regards.
Mohd tariq siddiqui

review: Treatment done well and always supportive. Diagnosis done properly.  Always proactive and give good suggestion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Girish Bhalerao is very friendly.  He examines the patient thoroughly and understands the problem. Post that he gives the right treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Girish have good enough experience in knee replacement surgery, I’m the patient of Dr Girish and he have done my total knee replacement surgery very well and Mashallah now I can walk properly ..!!  I recommend other patients also for same surgery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My husband had to undergo hand surgery as his bone was broken in an accident and his situation was very critical. I would like to highly recommend him. I was relieved the way the surgery was done by Dr. Girish bhalerao and the other customer service provided by wockhardth hospital. There are very few hospitals in Mira road which I feel is good. Thank you very much Dr. Girish Bhaleroa:) May Allah give you all the success you deserved:)
